item.title: CV - David Jones
item.description: Professional Summary Experienced in designing and implementing complex solutions across multiple industries, nationally and internationally. Possesses strong technical expertise and excellent communication skills. Able to translate business requirements effectively into technical solutions that meet or exceed client expectations. Experienced in managing large transformation projects, cloud migrations, and legacy update programs. Possess strong leadership qualities and can guide teams in achieving project goals. Provide architectural leadership to ensure project success. Proficient in team management, including assigning tasks, setting goals, and ensuring deadlines are met.
